#summary A list and description of other schema used in these projects
#labels DC19

= Introduction =

Here is a list of schema used by the DC19 CMSS system. Note that these are not the authoritative schema files. Those are located [http://code.google.com/p/ands-la-trobe/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fxforms here].

===LTU dataset===

    <otherElectronic type="" />

===Notes===

<hasCollector id="" /> 
 * Values: Collector's name (plaintext), @id: fedora entry pid 
 * Sources: RLI booking system, @id: fedora internal

<subject type="" code="" />
 * Values: Name of subject (plaintext), @type: classification index/type (e.g ICHI, CAS, etc) @code: lookup code
 * Sources: Some added autmoatically on ingest, based on submission source (e.g machine type)
